thread.title: Charlene Packer

author: Charlene Packer
title: Charlene Packer
text: I've been traveling in Australia and all of my house sits have been gorgeous rural properties and the owners are golden. This website has definitely helped me to see a different side of the country a typical tourist would not have the chance to. It's super easy to use to search and to contact people. I love it and will continue to use Trusted Housesitters. üòÅ
